item.description: Trailhead:Take I93 north to exit 32,Take the Kancamagus Highway(NH112) east,just after passing the Jigger Johnson Campground,make a left onto Bear Notch Road(not on all highway maps),in Bartlett make a left onto US302,make a left onto Sawyer River Road,in 2 miles the parking lot for Signal Ridge Trail is on the left,just over the bridge for the Whiteface Brook.We will hike the Signal Ridge Trail to the summit of Mount Carrigain(4700').Magnificent views from the fire tower on the summit. 10 miles round trip,10 hours estimated time.-----Steve-----As a condition of attending this meetup you agree to release,hold harmless,and indemnify the organizer(s) and all members of this group from any and all claims for property damage,injury,illness and/or death,including those caused by negligence and or other reasons.You also agree to assume all risk associated with this meetup and agree to know and follow the Hiker Responsibility Code described at www.hikesafe.com
item.how_to_find_us: Black Colorado pick up truck NH2431202
item.name: STRENUOUS HIKE-MOUNT CARRIGAIN
